Company Name: Abdul Mohsen Al Hokair Group for Tourism and Development Co (1820)
Description: Abdul Mohsen Al Hokair Group for Tourism and Development Co (known as: Al Hokair Group) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since June 2014. Al Hokair Group operates within the Consumer Services sector focusing on Hotels, Resorts and Cruise Lines. It has Companies operating across UAE and Saudi Arabia. Al Hokair Group is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and was established in July 1978.

Shareholder Name: Abdulmohsen Al Hokair and Sons Holding Co
